mission_data.mission_description: This mission pits your intrepid crew against the evil forces of... greedy capitalists? The Hamak Sector is full of interesting characters, new gadgets, and shady deals. But every cadet knows that unidentified tachyon sources always indicate one thing: TROUBLE! Can your crew uncover what's really going on in the Hamak Sector?^^Full crew of six experienced players recommended.

set_ship_text.name: GW Unlimited 214
set_ship_text.desc: Cargo hold contains rare crystals, tobacco products, and large quantities of alcohol.

set_ship_text.name: Warsaw
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Library Computer: Captain Haynes was reprimanded for being overly aggressive at the battle of Helix Aquarius.

set_ship_text.name: Acme Arms Dealer
set_ship_text.desc: Cargo hold contains various TSN weapons, including nukes.

event.name: Haynes Hello 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Ahoy Artemis. I'm Captain Amelia Haynes of the starship Warsaw. Welcome to the armpit of the galaxy. None of my business what you screwed up to get transfered here, I just wanted to say 'Hi' before ol' Squeaks gets to ya. Now I've got to get back to my FUBAR mission of scanning tachyons.

warning_popup_message.message: New message from Admiral Weeks of Hamak Base.

event.name: Weeks Hello 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Attention Artemis. This is 2-star Admiral Giles Weeks. Welcome to the peaceful Hamak Sector. Please dock at Hamak Base and receive a magnetic ramscoop. It will let Artemis collect energy in the Hamak Nebula, which saves money. In my sector, everyone makes a profit.

event.name: Ramscoop Expensive 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Yes, ramscoops are expensive. But don't worry, you won't need to pay a millicredit for yours. The Syndicate will take care of everything.

event.name: It Squeaks 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. See why I call him 'Squeaks'? If you pry two credits from his money-grubbing hand, it squeaks. All he cares about are his profits. I'm in this war to fight, not make money.

event.name: Ramscoop Begin 1

warning_popup_message.message: WARNING: DO NOT UNDOCK DURING RAMSCOOP TRANSFER.

set_ship_text.name: Tachyon Source 1
set_ship_text.desc: Sensors detect high levels of tachyon activity. Unable to determine source at this range.

set_ship_text.name: Tachyon Source 2
set_ship_text.desc: Sensors detect high levels of tachyon activity. Unable to determine source at this range.

set_ship_text.name: Tachyon Source 3
set_ship_text.desc: Sensors detect high levels of tachyon activity. Unable to determine source at this range.

event.incoming_comms_text: Ramscoop installation beginning. Do not undock during ramscoop installation.

event.name: Ramscoop Begin 3
event.incoming_comms_text: You can use your new ramscoop anywhere in the Hamak Nebula. It won't work if your shields are up, or if you're traveling at warp speed. Just drop your shields and move at impulse speed. The faster you go, the more energy you will gather.

event.name: Ramscoop 25%
event.incoming_comms_text: You can use your new ramscoop anywhere in the Hamak Nebula. It won't work if your shields are up, or if you're traveling at warp speed. Just drop your shields and move at impulse speed. The faster you go, the more energy you will gather.
Ramscoop installation 25% complete. Do you guys have any spare holo-games? I'll give you a good price.

event.name: Ramscoop 50%
event.incoming_comms_text: Ramscoop installation 50% complete. How about a hot tub? I have a beauty that will fit in your torpedo bay. Practically brand new.

warning_popup_message.message: Scanning tachyon source in grid C1.

event.name: Ramscoop 75%
event.incoming_comms_text: Ramscoop installation 75% complete. Need any cigarettes? Just ten credits a pack - - - even less if you buy in bulk!

event.name: Ramscoop Installed 1

warning_popup_message.message: Scanning tachyon source in grid C1.

event.incoming_comms_text: Your ramscoop installation is complete. Come back tomorrow for a deal on French ice cream!

event.name: Ramscoop Installed 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Artemis, I'm giving you a science mission. An hour ago, we detected three new tachyon sources in the nebula. You will investigate unknown tachyon source #1 in grid C1. There's a bonus if you find a way to make money from it.

event.name: Meet Greenhaw
event.incoming_comms_text: Hi Artemis. The Operations Manager left me in charge and gave me this awesome hot tub! Today is a good day to take shore leave, if you know what I mean.

event.name: Greenhaw Finds Nuke
event.incoming_comms_text: ^Hey Artemis! I just found a nuke! It's probably a dud, but it's yours if you want it.

event.name: Greenhaw Snivels
event.incoming_comms_text: Um, Artemis? It's getting kind of scary here. Lieutennant Jowarski is in command now and she says the Torgoths might kill us all. But you're going to protect us, right?

event.name: Wreck Artemis!
event.incoming_comms_text: Artemis! Are you insane? We weren't done installing your ramscoop!

event.name: Safety Warning 2
event.incoming_comms_text: Warning Artemis! Do not undock during a major refit. Please repair your damage, and return to the base.

warning_popup_message.message: WEAPONS BAY reports Mines, Nukes, ECMs,

event.name: Confiscate Weapons 2
event.set_timer: Good news, Artemis! The Syndicate just sold all of your torpedo weapons and made enough money to pay for your ramscoop, with a little leftover for you. Now every person on the Artemis owns one share of the Hamak Syndicate. Good job!

event.name: Confiscate Weapons 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Good news, Artemis! The Syndicate just sold all of your torpedo weapons and made enough money to pay for your ramscoop, with a little leftover for you. Now every person on the Artemis owns one share of the Hamak Syndicate. Good job!

event.name: Going the Wrong Way 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Attention, Artemis! This is 2-star Admiral Giles Weeks, Supreme Commander of the Hamak Sector. Your mission is to investigate unknown tachyon source #1, located in grid C1 of the nebula. You are to leave unknown tachyon source #3 for the Warsaw. Please turn hard to port and complete your mission.

event.name: Haynes not Worried 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. Don't worry about your weapons. We're 20 parsecs from the front lines, and we never fire a shot here. Squeaks even sold our minefield to the Kraliens.

warning_popup_message.message: Sensor contact with Warsaw lost. Possible nebula interference.

event.name: Nebula Thick Message 2
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. The nebula is pretty thick here. We can't see a damned thing. The tachyon energy keeps rising, so we're probing deeper.

set_ship_text.name: Warsaw
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Library Computer: Captain Haynes was repremanded for being overly aggressive at the battle of Helix Aquarius.

event.name: Bite Me 2
event.set_timer: Haynes to Artemis. Now approaching tachyon source #3. I bet two months of paperwork that my crew can figure this out before yours. And if you talk to ol' Squeaks, tell him he can 'Bite Me'!

event.name: Bite Me 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. Now approaching tachyon source #3. I bet two months of paperwork that my crew can figure this out before yours. And if you talk to ol' Squeaks, tell him he can 'Bite Me'!

event.name: Spotted Something 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. Intermittent sensor contact ahead. It could be a Torgoth ship.

event.name: Rumors 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Attention Warsaw. Miss Haynes, please don't start any rumors of Torgoths in this sector. It would be bad for business. Please do your little science mission and come home.

event.name: Set up first round of enemies

set_ship_text.name: Tachyon Source 1
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Generating a false target image on the edge of the sector. True location appears on the viewscreen.

set_ship_text.name: Tachyon Source 2
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Generating a false target image on the edge of the sector. True location appears on the viewscreen.

set_ship_text.name: Tachyon Source 3
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Generating a false target image on the edge of the sector. True location appears on the viewscreen.

set_ship_text.name: Warsaw
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Library Computer: Captain Haynes has an outstanding battle record.

event.name: Red Alert 2
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. Go to battlestations! A Torgoth fleet just appeared at the tachyon source. Their weapons are armed and locked on us. The armpit of the galaxy just became the front line in a gut-busting, mother-lovin' starship war! Let's give 'em hell!

log.text: I think Admiral Weeks pooped his pants!\n\n

event.name: Weeks Responds to Hell 3
event.incoming_comms_text: My God, look at all thost Torgoths! Warsaw and Artemis, you must hold them off as long as possible. The Syndicate needs to haul a lot of merchandise away from this base.

event.name: FUBAR Message 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. There's another ship called the Chicago at Hamak Base, but Squeaks won't send it to reinforce us. He left us totally FUBARed! If you ever see Squeaks again, you can tell him to kiss my a-#(*&0_!@.1.//#$ [[Signal Lost]]

event.name: FUBAR Message 4
event.incoming_comms_text: Weeks to Warsaw! Weeks to Warsaw! Miss Haynes, please respond!

event.name: Not Dead 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. Glad you're not dead! We've chased this Torgy-bastard halfway across the nebula. Help us finish him off.

set_ship_text.name: Warsaw
set_ship_text.desc: This ship has sustained severe damage and casualties, but they have made repairs.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The Engine Room is bypassed like a plate of spaghetti.

event.name: First GW 214 Escape 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Departing Hamak Base on course for the alternate rendezvous. Good luck with your little alien war problem.

event.name: Two Freighters Escape 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Goodbye Hamak Sector. You were a profitable place while you lasted!

event.name: Weeks Escapes on Chicago 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Hello, Artemis. This is Giles Weeks. I'm going to Tau Ceti for, um... reinforcements. Hold out as long as you can. Don't worry, I'll send your Syndicate shares to your next of kin. If I can swing it, there will be posthumous medals for your entire crew. Farewell, Artemis.

set_ship_text.name: Warsaw
set_ship_text.desc: This ship has sustained severe damage and casualties but is still battle worthy.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The crew is making rude gestures at the Torgoths.

event.name: Haynes Will Follow 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. As I suspected, Weeks ran away from the battlefield. That leaves you in charge. Warsaw will follow your orders. Let's hit these Torgies hard.

event.name: GW 157 Vacating 2
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Golf Whiskey One Five Seven. We are vacating this sector. Good luck, Hamak Base. You're going to need it.

warning_popup_message.message: Tachyon energy has fallen to ZERO.

event.name: Advisory Warning 3
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Hamak Base calling all GW Unlimited merchant ships. The Hamak Sector is under attack. All cargo ships proceed to alternate rendezvous points. This is an automated message. Have a nice day.

warning_popup_message.message: Coded Torgoth message intercepted. Decoding in process.

event.name: Torgoth Message 4
event.incoming_comms_text: Standing by to teleport new battle squadron.

warning_popup_message.message: Coded Torgoth message intercepted. Repeat of previous message.

event.name: Wise Guys Warning 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Attention, Artemis! This is 2-star Admiral Giles Weeks, Supreme Commander of the Hamak Sector. Your mission is to investigate unknown tachyon source #1, located in grid C1 of the nebula. You are to leave unknown tachyon source #3 for the Warsaw. Please turn hard to port and complete your mission.

warning_popup_message.message: Engineering Team reports Ramscoop ready for use.

event.name: GW 214 Bargain 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Hamak Base, this is GW 214. We got a bargain price on some rare Kralien jewelry. We're also carrying cuban cigars, Irish whiskey, and a new Playdroid for the Big Guy. Prepare for docking.

event.name: GW 214 Bargain 4
event.incoming_comms_text: Welcome, 214. The Big Guy sends his compliments.

event.name: GW 157 Blood Money 3
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Golf Whiskey One Five Seven calling Hamak Base. You won't believe this. We scored a shipment of human blood. During wartime, blood is worth more than gold. The Syndicate is gonna make a killing! Prepare for docking, and tell the Big Guy, my crew expects an extra share this month.

event.name: GW 157 Blood Money 4
event.incoming_comms_text: GW 157, this is Giles Weeks. I can always count on you boys to keep these profits flowing. Nice work! You'll all get extra shares in the Syndicate. And this Christmas, you'll get a personal bonus from me.

event.name: GW 157 Blood Money 5
event.incoming_comms_text: Thanks Admiral. That's just what I wanted to hear.

event.name: Haynes Compliment 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. Great job! You're really kicking Torgie butts.

event.name: Haynes Compliment 6
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. Nice shot!

event.name: Haynes Compliment 9
event.incoming_comms_text: Haynes to Artemis. You don't get to have all the fun. Save a few Torgies for us!

warning_popup_message.message: Admiral Weeks security credentials confirmed aboard Starship Chicago.

big_message.title: DEFEAT!
big_message.subtitle1: Hamak Base was destroyed and the
